Text:
Thank you for uploading all of these, I really appreciate the time you take to upload the iPod rips. I just need to grab the last episode. Also, is The Crimson Horror a different rip? I noticed that it's smaller in size than the other one you uploaded. Plus TCH had a different resolution than the rest when I downloaded it.

Anywho, thanks again for these. You're the best!!

Yeah, Crimson Horror is a different file. When I first uploaded it I ran into some snags so it ended up being very slapdash. I wanted the collection here to have a proper version.

I'm glad you're enjoying them!
